title: authentication: Could not retrieve private key from keystore
body:
# Bug Report

## Description


macOS authentication issue and not able to diable "Biometric login and transaction authentication.



## Steps to reproduce

Not sure, how did I get here.

##### Trying to login
1. macOS authentication
![Screenshot 2023-09-12 at 10 58 18](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/1529006/33b72286-6cc8-4b0f-80a2-910b0e8c3c63)

##### When trying to disable "biometric login"
1. Enabled
![Screenshot 2023-09-12 at 11 24 24](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/1529006/b537e81c-bccc-46f9-9977-9f535cdc3de9)
2. Trying to disable
![Screenshot 2023-09-12 at 11 24 28](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/1529006/ac4c368a-45ef-420f-9cb3-6534869c4b89)

#### Expected behavior

1. macOS authentication succeeds
2. "biometric login" can be disabled

#### Actual behavior

##### Trying to login
1. Status failure
![Screenshot 2023-09-12 at 10 58 41](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/1529006/0dde7705-2f4f-47c1-b986-4427e3f77e66)
2. Status authentication
![Screenshot 2023-09-12 at 10 58 48](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/1529006/df90945b-8183-474f-ad03-a5482101abf4)

##### When trying to disable "biometric login", nothing happens:
1. Entering password
![Screenshot 2023-09-12 at 11 24 40](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/1529006/57e2cd32-3f40-41e3-91f0-f14965af569f)
2. After entering the macOS password
![Screenshot 2023-09-12 at 11 24 50](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/1529006/4b95f1b6-e3f2-4406-a353-e270edcfe0f4)

### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: 0.13.3
- Operating System: macOS 13.4.1
